Articles.Content:
I have a sattelite in a polar orbit around minmus, with a 1000 charge battery, an antenna and an M700 survey scanning module. Scanning and and transmitting works, but then no overlay is offered (neither in the module context menu, nor in the map view).

Installed mods: Remote Tech, Mechjeb 2, Chatterer

Pictures: https://imgur.com/a/zkxYq

How can I get the ore overlay?

Edited November 14, 2015 by marian

1) Have you scanned?

2) Have you updated Asteroid Day if you have it? I don't know if it's related, but an outdated Asteroid Day can cause bugs

3) No idea
This may be a bug caused by the addons, as the overlay is working in the map screen and the flight scene in a stock install, but is currently not working in the tracking station in 1.0.5

1) Have you scanned?
Yes.
2) Have you updated Asteroid Day if you have it? I don't know if it's related, but an outdated Asteroid Day can cause bugs
I don't have this mod installed.
This may be a bug caused by the addons, as the overlay is working in the map screen and the flight scene in a stock install, but is currently not working in the tracking station in 1.0.5

Do you have any idea what to do? I can't remove the mods since all my vessels have remotetech and mechjeb parts. Maybe I'll just have to wait for the next update that fixes the tracking station bug in stock KSP?
I'd try updating your existing addons if they have been updated for 1.0.5, or you'll have to wait until they are, sorry.

Fixed it by editing persistent.sfs and changing 

SCENARIO
    {
        name = ResourceScenario
        scene = 5, 7, 6
        RESOURCE_SETTINGS
        {
            GameSeed = 1182914141
            MaxDeltaTime = 21600
        }
    }

to 

SCENARIO
    {
        name = ResourceScenario
        scene = 5, 7, 6
        RESOURCE_SETTINGS
        {
            GameSeed = 1182914141
            MaxDeltaTime = 21600
            PLANET_SCAN_DATA
            {
                PlanetId = 3
            }
        }
    }
